meanings.definition: Lack of moral principles or standards.
meanings.sent1: The unmorality of his actions shocked everyone at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She was troubled by the unmorality of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The unmorality of the villain in the story made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The unmorality of the decision cast a dark shadow over the company.
meanings.sent5: The unmorality of the crime scene was evident from the lack of fingerprints.

meanings.definition: The state of being immoral or unethical.
meanings.sent1: The unmorality of the situation was clear to everyone involved.
meanings.sent2: He was accused of living in unmorality by his peers.
meanings.sent3: The unmorality of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unmorality of the relationship was like a storm brewing in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The unmorality of the decision lingered in the air like a bad smell.
